about.title: About
about.subtitle: Learn more about the project, its purpose, and the team behind it.
about.whatIsDescription: Campus forum and course review community
about.whatIsContent: project-consensus is a campus forum and course review community designed by Frank Yang and Jim Yang. It aims to help students share insights, discuss courses, and build a collaborative community.
about.repositoryDescription: Explore the source code and contribute
about.repositoryContent: The project is open-source. Check out the repository and feel free to open issues or submit pull requests.
